weather_report:
The morning unfolds in Boston with an alluring warmth that wraps the city in a cozy embrace. The skies, an expansive canvas of cerulean blue, offer a pristine view, yet the gentle haze hints at the humidity lurking within the heat. As the day advances, the air will thicken with warmth, reaching a height of nearly 98 degrees, causing the heat index to suggest a stifling feel of 103. Though the sun beams confidently above, a northward breeze dances lightly, offering moments of respite amidst the warmth. This evening promises a gentle descent into a comfortable night, with temperatures tapering to around 70, maintaining that inviting charm, albeit with the hint of warmth still lingering.

In such weather, one might opt for light fabrics to keep cool—perhaps a breezy linen shirt paired with relaxed cotton shorts would suit the day perfectly. As the sun paints the city in golden hues, consider a leisurely stroll along the waterfront, seeking the gentlest shade of a tree or the cooling embrace of the nearby ocean breeze. A visit to a local café, where sunlight spills through large windows, may provide a sweet moment of refreshment. While today's heat may feel like a warm blanket, embracing the outdoors with a mindful spirit will surely transform it into a cherished experience.
